EMKEL.IS.summary: Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells transformers, disconnectors, epoxy resin, and silicone composite products in Turkey. It offers oil immersed and epoxy resin current and voltage transformers, disconnectors with and without earthing switches, insulators, components, grading and coupling capacitors, and phase earthing switches. The company also exports its products to 118 countries. Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

GEREL.IS.long_name: Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
GEREL.IS.summary: Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells electrical products that combine and protect systems and materials worldwide. The company offers busbar systems that are used in shopping centers, factories, hotels, schools, office buildings, transformer centers, and LV outlets, as well as distributes and transmits lighting systems; cable trays systems for use in building, airports, ships, refineries, etc.; and cable support systems. It also produces various conductors and connection parts for earthing systems; feeder pillar and distribution panel systems; G-bus automation systems; Led-bus systems; car charging systems; and underfloor trunkings. In addition, the company provides grounding and lightning prevention systems, spark gap arresters, main and intermediate distribution plates, elevated type cable supports and bauds, ventilation systems, support elements, cable combinations, cable and pipe tagging systems, and special conveyors, as well as disconnect, connect, and support elements. Its products are used in steel construction combination and fixation systems for power transmission lines, mechanical conveyor systems, buildings, industrial plants, car factories, airports, oil-gas refineries, malls, platform grills, and fixation and concrete systems. The company was formerly known as Gersan Ticaret. Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PRKAB.IS.long_name: Türk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi
PRKAB.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture, import, export, and trading of cables, conductors, machinery, apparatus, tools and equipment, and spare parts and accessories for energy and telecommunication industries worldwide. The company offers a range of energy cables, including insulated low, medium, and high voltage, as well as building cables; and building, low voltage, and fire resistant cables. It also provides various telecom solutions, such as optical fiber cables and accessories, copper and telephone cables, building and antenna cables, signal and control cables, data center cables, and structured cabling solutions, as well as multimedia solutions comprising industrial communication and coaxial cables, and studio/broadcast and mobile networks solutions. In addition, the company offers nuclear, photovoltaic, ship, rolling stock, railway, airport and elevator runway, control, rubber insulated, and automotive cables. Further, it provides integrated solutions and services for downhole technology, SURF, and core cables. The company offers its products primarily under the Prysmian and Draka brands. The company was formerly known as Turk Pirelli Kablo ve Sistemleri A.S. and changed its name to TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi in September 2005. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mudanya, Turkey. TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Draka Holding B.V.

SANEL.IS.long_name: San-el Mühendislik Elektrik Taahhüt Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANEL.IS.summary: San-el MÃ¼hendislik Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells electrical panels in Turkey. The company offers LV and MV power capacitors, LV and MV harmonic filter reactors, LV thyristor switching modules, and GE switchgears. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ULUSE.IS.long_name: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat Taahhüt ve Ticaret A.S.
ULUSE.IS.summary: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. designs, manufactures, and sells solutions for electricity generation, transmission, and distribution systems primarily in Turkey. It offers metal enclosed modular, metal clad, and gas insulated switchgears; and compact transformer substations, medium voltage distribution transformers and switchgear components, and medium voltage cable accessories. The company also exports its products to approximately 70 countries. Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Eaton Industries XX Unlimited Company.
